divs: sighting detailseach has smaller round reddish\orange around them. so far a large plane has flown near the 2nd object, the 1st craft has had several planes go by it. i noticed the first round object almost an hour ago. it's still here, it's moved and it's lights have dimmed. 2nd object had the same light pattern as larger object. both have smaller different colored objects floating. the smaller ones i can't see a design, but they are different colors. very odd. my friend noticed seond craft.
Summary: there are now 2 bigger objects,1 in western sky over arvada and another closer to denver
trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Arvada
There was one other sighting in Arvada on or around June 9th 2007
